answer_found_by_llm: No suspicious external IP address responsible for the initial access was found in the provided PCAP file. The observed activity involves internal lateral movement between 10.0.0.130 and 10.0.0.133.
The hostname of the machine involved in the suspicious activity is HR-PC.
The username utilized in suspicious authentication steps was IEUser.
The service executable set up by the suspicious user is PSEXESVC.exe.
The network share used by PsExec to install the service is ADMIN$.
The network share used by PsExec for communication is IPC$.
No second machine hostname was identified in the PCAP. The observed SMB traffic involved multiple IPs (10.0.0.130, 10.0.0.131, 10.0.0.133), but no additional hostnames were resolved.
